chapters.title: Wolf! Wolf!
chapters.description: Little Bo Peep is threatened when wolves attempt to capture them.

chapters.description: Mighty Mouse comes to the rescue after drinking a bottle of 'Atomic Energy'.

chapters.title: The Crackpot King
chapters.description: The Little King wants a wife.

chapters.title: The Jail Break
chapters.description: Mighty House against Bad Bill Bunion.

chapters.title: Swiss Cheese Family Robinson
chapters.description: A shipwrecked mouse family is beached on a tropical island.

chapters.title: The Feudin' Hillbillies

chapters.title: The Magic Slipper
chapters.description: This is a rather shopworn variation on Cinderella.

chapters.description: Three mice seek refuge during a winter storm.
